usefulItems: 2 baking trays and baking paper, pastry cutter, rolling pin, wire rack, airtight container, oven
title: Oaty Cookies with Wholemeal Flour and Honey

ingredients.content: 100 g wholemeal flour, plus extra for dusting

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C and line two baking trays with baking paper.
Place flour, oats, sugar, salt and bicarbonate of soda in mixing bowl then mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.

Add lemon juice, milk and honey then mix <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>. Tip dough out and bring together. On a generously floured work surface, roll out dough until 5 mm - 7 mm thick. Cut out circles of dough with a pastry cutter (Ø 5 cm) and place on prepared trays.
Bake for 12-15 minutes (200°C). Remove from oven, then transfer to a wire rack to cool, before serving or storing in an airtight container.
